trans-unit.source: The ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement class represents a configuration element for an <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement 類別表示組態項目<xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> can be configured for server applications using standard configuration files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>可以使用標準的組態檔的伺服器應用程式的設定。</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement>, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 當這個建構函式用來初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>類別<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement>、<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>，和<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection>屬性設定為`null`。</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance should be set to appropriate values for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 上的屬性<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>類別執行個體應該設定為適當的值，然後再呼叫應用程式<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: The BuildPolicy method builds a new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance based on the properties set on the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: BuildPolicy 方法會建置新<xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref>的執行個體上設定的屬性型<xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance must be set before calling the BuildPolicy method.
trans-unit.target: 上的屬性<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>類別執行個體必須在呼叫 BuildPolicy 方法之前設定。</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance that represents the extended protection policy created.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref>執行個體，表示建立的延伸的保護原則。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂服務提供者名稱 (SPN) 清單用來比對用戶端的 SPN，這個組態的原則項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref> that includes the custom SPN list used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含自訂的 SPN 清單用來比對用戶端的 SPN。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the policy enforcement value for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個組態的原則項目的原則強制執行值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref>值，指出延伸的保護原則應強制執行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個組態的原則項目延伸的保護原則強制執行保護的類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"></xref> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"> </xref>值，指出原則強制執行保護的類型。
